name: Mini Green Skimmer Pup
description:
Surprisingly, newborn skimmer pups don't need any parental care after birth.
Combine 1 Blue and 2 Green Mini Skimmer Pups with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Orange Skimmer Pup.
Combine 1 Orange and 2 Blue Mini Skimmer Pups with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Purple Skimmer Pup.
